reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. DEBOUE v. WHITLEY, 618 So.2d 399 (La. 1993)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. THOMAS MITCHELL DEBOUE v. JOHN P. WHITLEY,

opinion.posture: In re Deboue, Thomas Mitchell; â€” Plaintiff(s); applying for supervisory and/or remedial Writs; Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court, Div. "B", No. 301-828.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Granted in part, denied in part. Trial court is ordered to furnish reasonable funds to hire a psychiatrist/neurologist. In all other respects, the application is denied.
[2] LEMMON, J., not on panel; recused.
